You can be a certain Ability Point-centered version of your character by assigning your Ability Points According across Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma depending on what type of combat or interactions you want to have. This will further affect how you will play the game, where you position your character, and whether you are a tank at the frontlines of combat or not.
